explains: adj. 自由的；无限制的；不受束缚的

sentences.en: Freedom to pursue extracurricular activities is totally unrestricted.
sentences.cn: 参加课外活动的自由完全不受限制。

sentences.en: The authorities have failed so far to enact a law allowing unrestricted emigration.
sentences.cn: 当局到目前为止还未能通过一项允许自由移民出境的法律。

sentences.en: Nearly all seats have an unrestricted view.
sentences.cn: 几乎所有的座位都没有任何东西阻挡视线。
